Ltd.","details":"VERSION: 1.1         DATE:    2020-06-22","methods":{"calculateRedemptionMulti(uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256)[])":{"details":"Sum the value of the bAssets, and then find the proportions relative to the desired mIx quantity.","params":{"_allBassets":"Array of all bAsset information","_mIxQuantity":"Quantity of mIx to redeem"},"return":"isValid          Bool to signify that the redemption is allowedreason           If the redemption is invalid, this is the reasonquantities       Array of bAsset quantities to redeem"},"validateMint(uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256)":{"details":"Is the resulting weighting of the max bAsset beyond it's implicit max weight? Max weight is determined as max weight (in units)","params":{"_bAsset":"Struct containing relevant data on the bAsset","_bAssetQuantity":"Number of bAsset units that will be used to mint","_totalVault":"Current sum of basket collateral"},"return":"isValid          Bool to signify that the mint does not move our weightings the wrong wayreason           If the mint is invalid, this is the reason"},"validateMintMulti(uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256)[],uint256[])":{"details":"Is the resulting weighting of the max bAssets beyond their implicit max weight? Max weight is determined as max weight (in units)","params":{"_bAssetQuantities":"Number of bAsset units that will be used to mint (aligned with above)","_bAssets":"Array of Struct containing relevant data on the bAssets","_totalVault":"Current sum of basket collateral"},"return":"isValid          Bool to signify that the mint does not move our weightings the wrong wayreason           If the mint is invalid, this is the reason"},"validateRedemption(bool,uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256)[],uint8[],uint256[])":{"details":"A redemption is valid if it does not push any untouched bAssets above their max weightings. In addition, if bAssets are currently above their max weight (i.e. during basket composition changes) they must be redeemed","params":{"_allBassets":"Array of all bAsset information","_bAssetQuantities":"Quantity of bAsset to redeem","_basketIsFailed":"Bool to suggest that the basket has failed a recollateralisation attempt","_indices":"Indexes of the bAssets to redeem","_totalVault":"Sum of collateral units in the basket"},"return":"isValid          Bool to signify that the redemption is allowedreason           If the redemption is invalid, this is the reasonfeeRequired      Does this redemption require the swap fee to be applied"},"validateSwap(uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256),(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256)":{"details":"Input bAsset must not exceed max weight, output bAsset must have sufficient liquidity","params":{"_inputBasset":"Input bAsset details","_outputBasset":"Output bAsset details","_quantity":"Number of bAsset units on the input side","_totalVault":"Current sum of basket collateral"},"return":"isValid          Bool to signify that the mint does not move our weightings the wrong wayreason           If the swap is invalid, this is the reasonoutput           Units of output bAsset, before fee is appliedapplySwapFee     Bool to signify that the swap fee is applied"}},"title":"ForgeValidator"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"calculateRedemptionMulti(uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256)[])":{"notice":"Calculates the relative quantities of bAssets to redeem, with current basket state"},"validateMint(uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256)":{"notice":"Checks whether a given mint is valid and returns the result"},"validateMintMulti(uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256)[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Checks whether a given mint using more than one asset is valid and returns the result"},"validateRedemption(bool,uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256)[],uint8[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Checks whether a given redemption is valid and returns the result"},"validateSwap(uint256,(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256),(address,uint8,bool,uint256,uint256,uint256),uint256)":{"notice":"Checks whether a given swap is valid and calculates the output"}},"notice":"Calculates whether or not minting or redemption is valid, based         on how it affects the underlying basket collateral calculateRedemptionMulti(uint256,(addres.details: Sum the value of the bAssets, and then find the proportions relative to the desired mIx quantity.
calculateRedemptionMulti(uint256,(addres.return: isValid          Bool to signify that the redemption is allowedreason           If the redemption is invalid, this is the reasonquantities       Array of bAsset quantities to redeem

validateMint(uint256,(address,uint8,bool.details: Is the resulting weighting of the max bAsset beyond it's implicit max weight? Max weight is determined as max weight (in units)

params._bAsset: Struct containing relevant data on the bAsset
params._bAssetQuantity: Number of bAsset units that will be used to mint

validateMint(uint256,(address,uint8,bool.return: isValid          Bool to signify that the mint does not move our weightings the wrong wayreason           If the mint is invalid, this is the reason

validateMintMulti(uint256,(address,uint8.details: Is the resulting weighting of the max bAssets beyond their implicit max weight? Max weight is determined as max weight (in units)

params._bAssetQuantities: Number of bAsset units that will be used to mint (aligned with above)
params._bAssets: Array of Struct containing relevant data on the bAssets

validateMintMulti(uint256,(address,uint8.return: isValid          Bool to signify that the mint does not move our weightings the wrong wayreason           If the mint is invalid, this is the reason

validateRedemption(bool,uint256,(address.details: A redemption is valid if it does not push any untouched bAssets above their max weightings. In addition, if bAssets are currently above their max weight (i.e. during basket composition changes) they must be redeemed

params._basketIsFailed: Bool to suggest that the basket has failed a recollateralisation attempt
params._indices: Indexes of the bAssets to redeem
params._totalVault: Sum of collateral units in the basket

validateRedemption(bool,uint256,(address.return: isValid          Bool to signify that the redemption is allowedreason           If the redemption is invalid, this is the reasonfeeRequired      Does this redemption require the swap fee to be applied

validateSwap(uint256,(address,uint8,bool.details: Input bAsset must not exceed max weight, output bAsset must have sufficient liquidity

params._quantity: Number of bAsset units on the input side

validateSwap(uint256,(address,uint8,bool.return: isValid          Bool to signify that the mint does not move our weightings the wrong wayreason           If the swap is invalid, this is the reasonoutput           Units of output bAsset, before fee is appliedapplySwapFee     Bool to signify that the swap fee is applied

validateMintMulti(uint256,(address,uint8.notice: Checks whether a given mint using more than one asset is valid and returns the result
